metadata.description: An all-new cast of sinister characters! Secrets from Deuce's past! And the shocking return of the deadliest (and sexiest!) Danger Girl villain of all-time! Fans of the original and best-selling Danger Girl series CAN'T MISS what's sure to be the wildest adventure of the year! Plus... a mysterious Major lurks in the wings!
metadata.name: Danger Girl: May Day
